name: DOOM 2D (itch)
description:
This is a game I developed as part of my A Level computer science course using Pygame. It is a top-down dungeon crawler type game, heavily reminiscent of the DOOM series. It consists of 3 levels, all to be completed as fast as possible sequentially. Other than that the only way you'll find out about it is if you download and play it now!

Thank you to anyone who has downloaded it and played it, I hope you enjoyed it for the 6 minutes of gameplay that it gives you :)
